landing.paragraph_1: A platform where creators and advertisers meet.
landing.paragraph_2: Gain visibility to thousands of advertisers. Find the right content creator using our advanced analytics.

sign_up.title: Sign Up

email.label: Email
email.already_exists_error: Email already in use, log in or recover your password

password.label: Password
password.minlength_error: Password must have at least 8 characters

modal_messages.confirm_email: You can close this window by confirming the email
modal_messages.confirm_email_desc: We send you a confirmation email

sign_up.text_1: By continuing, you agree to our

personal_information.title_creator: We want to know more about you...
personal_information.title_advertiser: We want to know more about your brand...
personal_information.paragraph_creator: We need some data from you to help you find the perfect advertisers for your content.
personal_information.paragraph_advertiser: We need some data so we can help you get the content creators you're looking for.

username.pattern_error: Must only contain letters and numbers

description.label: Description
description.placeholder_creator: Tell us about yourself. What do you do and what are your goals.

networks.title: Let us know your networks!
networks.paragraph_creator: Extend your reach as a content creator. Connect your networks to our platform and discover new opportunities to boost your online presence, connect with broader audiences and collaborate with other advertisers
networks.paragraph_advertiser: Expand your opportunities by connecting your networks with our platform. Boost your online presence by connecting and collaborating with content creators.

content.title_creator: Tell us what type of content you generate
content.title_advertiser: Tell us what type of content you are looking for
content.paragraph_creator: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Etiam risus et semper et sed cursus risus. Massa proin at leo maecenas ipsum platea risus dui mi.
content.paragraph_advertiser: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Etiam risus et semper et sed cursus risus. Massa proin at leo maecenas ipsum platea risus dui mi.

tags.label: Tags
tags.required_error: You must select at least one tag

youtube_integration.title: You are just one step away from joining Content...
youtube_integration.paragraph: To finish with the creation of your account, we need you to integrate at least one of the platforms where you upload your content. In this way, we will be able to access the necessary information to generate the analytics that brands want to know about you.
youtube_integration.loading_text: We are preparing everithing for you

edit.title: Edit profile
edit.error_title: Error trying to update profile data

init_talk.title: Start conversation
init_talk.paragraph_1: Enter your proposal to start a collaboration with the content creator.

score.title: Reputation
score.no_score_yet: It has not yet received enough scores to display information

messages.finisher_message_advertiser: Waiting for the creator to finish the chat.
messages.finisher_message_creator: The advertiser has marked this conversation as finished.
messages.confirm_finish_text: Are you sure you want to end the conversation? This will prevent you from continuing to send messages to the selected contact.
messages.not_finished: The creator has rejected the request to end the conversation
